name: Bailiffs, Correctional Officers, and Jailers_March 2023
description: The Bailiffs, Correctional Officers, and Jailers collection represents the skills needed to oversee individuals who have been arrested, sentenced to serve time in jail or prisons, or to maintain safety in courtrooms. Additionally, this collection of skills was developed in partnership with a panel of subject matter experts who have worked in these roles.
creator: https://credentialengineregistry.org/resources/ce-036d082d-d80e-41a7-99a0-2d63a4ad3a4a
author: Western Governors University
